alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 8:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Otero, northwestern Prowers, Kiowa, southeastern Crowley and northern Bent Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 828 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Northern Kiowa County to Eastern Otero County. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Las Animas, Ordway, Swink, Eads, Wiley, Sugar City, Cheraw, Sheridan Lake, Haswell, Neeoshe Reservoir, Chivington, Blue Lake, Sweetwater Reservoir, Hasty, Arlington, John Martin Reservoir and McClave. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
